creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
4.1.12 and current CVS has a couple of incorrect system ID URLs in tester, admin
and example webapps.  I'll attach a trivial patch.

creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 3355
Fix for incorrect system id's

Please apply this one, it's trivial, and present in 4.1.18 as well as current
CVS.  The patch applies cleanly.
creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi

text: Fixed in CVS.  Thanks for the patch.
